meanings.definition: A public display or demonstration of a skill or quality
meanings.sent1: The school's art exhibition showcased students' creativity.
meanings.sent2: The museum's exhibitions attract many visitors every year.
meanings.sent3: The magician's exhibition of tricks left the audience amazed.
meanings.sent4: Her exhibition of kindness towards others was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition of talent at the talent show was remarkable.

meanings.definition: A collection of items on display for the public to view
meanings.sent1: The exhibition at the zoo featured various animal species.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the rare artifacts in the museum's exhibitions.
meanings.sent3: The exhibition of antique cars was a blast from the past.
meanings.sent4: His exhibition of vintage stamps was a collector's dream.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition of historical artifacts provided a glimpse into the past.

meanings.definition: The act of presenting or showing something for others to see
meanings.sent1: Her exhibition of dance moves impressed the judges.
meanings.sent2: The artist's exhibitions always draw a large crowd.
meanings.sent3: The exhibition of his new invention wowed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The chef's exhibition of culinary skills was a feast for the eyes.
meanings.sent5: The exhibition of fireworks lit up the night sky.
